channel.title: ::vote4cash
channel.description:
when i try to add this, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,476829.0.html
i dont fucking understand it, website part and database shit works, but how does the vote system work?
can any one explane / help me?
p.m add me on skype danny.overesch
greetings danny

item.title: ::vote4cash
item.dc:creator: @MrSnow1 MrSnow1
item.description:
@MrSnow1 wrote:

Client Sided;

Open Client.Java
find if(inputString.quals
under that, add this

if(inputString.equals("::vote") || inputString.equals("::Vote") || inputString.equals("::VOTE"))
launchURL(“WEBSITE”);

Server Sided.

Open Commands.java
find if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase
under that, add this

if(playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“vote”)) {
c.sendMessage(“MESSAGE”);
}

		if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("voted")) {
		if(c.checkVotes(c.playerName)) {
		c.getItems().addItem(995,300000);
		c.sendMessage("message");
		}

Read full topic
